name: Moon Child (itch)
description:
Team Flying Frog Presents:  

Moon Child 
    (Demo)

Moon Warrior Lunara has fallen from space onto the Earth after a vicious attack that has killed the Moon!

Help Lunara collect ancient Moon relics scattered across the map to bring the Moon back, but watch out! Ancient Earth is filled with deadly creatures that you must overcome to collect all four relics.

Credits:
